fetch_dir(url)

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/commands/plugin.rb, line 535
535:   def fetch_dir(url)
536:     @level += 1
537:     push_d(File.basename(url)) if @level > 0
538:     open(url) do |stream|
539:       contents =  stream.read
540:       fetch(links(url, contents))
541:     end
542:     pop_d if @level > 0
543:     @level -= 1
544:   end
links(base_url, contents)

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/commands/plugin.rb, line 509
509:   def links(base_url, contents)
510:     links = []
511:     contents.scan(/href\s*=\s*\"*[^\">]*/) do |link|
512:       link = link.sub(/href="/, "")
513:       next if link =~ /svnindex.xsl$/
514:       next if link =~ /^(\w*:|)\/\// || link =~ /^\./
515:       links << File.join(base_url, link)
516:     end
517:     links
518:   end
ls()

[ show source ]

       # File railties/lib/rails/commands/plugin.rb, line 488
488:   def ls
489:     @urls_to_fetch.collect do |url|
490:       if url =~ /^svn(\+ssh)?:\/\/.*/
491:         `svn ls #{url}`.split("\n").map {|entry| "/#{entry}"} rescue nil
492:       else
493:         open(url) do |stream|
494:           links("", stream.read)
495:         end rescue nil
496:       end
497:     end.flatten
498:   end
